review: Installation was amazingly simple, we have two of them that we move around to different TV's and they all worked perfectly.  The unit is operable very quickly, much faster then built-in Smart TV apps on our newer TV's which is always a nice plus.Great for our kids who love watching movies on repeat. Very happy with the Amazon Prime selection of movies, shows & more.  Been using it since it came out several weeks ago and never had an issue with streaming, connectivity, etc. It just works.Great value for the price, allows you to turn any "dumb" TV with an HDMI port into a Smart TV.  Now we can toss some of the cable-tv set top boxes and be 'untethered' from the cable company!

review: I like it. It's not bad, but I prefer Apple TV.  I prefer how Apple TV integrates with all the other computers and iOS devices in my house. The bluetooth remote on this is superior, though.The interface is okay. Prime Movies work well. Netflix looks good.It's not just a stick though. It's a stick with an outlet that attaches to a cable cord. It's hard to hide on the side of a TV. We have ours plugged in directly to our Onkyo Receiver input which works well.
